name: ajanottaja
description: _Ajanottaja_ is a super simple time keeping tool built for my own use case, namely to keep track of time spent at work. There are a bunch of time tracking software out there, but most of them focus on employers or contractors need to surveil employee work time. What I need however is a tool which will allow me to monitor how long my work days are, and how many hours of time off I've accumulated.
